mapper.select: SELECT e.name, d.emp_code, dt.dep_name, d.start_date, d.end_date, dc.off_type, d.reason , d.mng_confirm, d.md_confirm, d.ceo_confirm, d.off_result FROM dayoff d JOIN dayoff_code dc ON d.off_code =dc.off_code JOIN employee e ON d.emp_code = e.emp_code JOIN department dt ON e.dep_code =dt.dep_code WHERE d.emp_code = #{empCode} AND YEAR(start_date) BETWEEN #{startYear} AND #{endYear} AND MONTH(start_date) BETWEEN #{startMonth} AND #{endMonth}
